ee langata mata athi une loku aprasadayak ayi me pita mihinekta me dewal kiyanne kiyala.samahara aya innawa pem sambathathawayak bindunama ee tharahata pemwathiya gana me wage dewal kiyana eka.eth methana ehema deyak neweyi thiyenne.wisthare kiyapu kenage hithe tharahak neweyi thibune.nathi wuna aadare gana dukak witharayi.samahara wita pihitak labeyi kiyala balaporoththuwen kiyanna athi.ee katahade ehema swarayakuth thibuna wage mathakayi.mama nam hithanne ehema unath thamange pudgalika dewal pita ayata kiyanna epa.mokada ethakota eken thamange pemwathiyage charitheta wenne loku kalalak.

ayage maranayata wasara kihipayakata pera ayage ek sahodarayeku wu jon namaththa miya giya athara ohuge sirura bahalana lada mini pettiye piyana wasimata mohothakata pera ohu wethin jiwaya pilibada salakunu daknata labina.
wadi wadiyen mathdrawya ahu wenawalu.
anuradhapura pradeshaye wikinimata athi hiro yathurupadi
kuppi giya mul dawase indala adatath sinno kiyanne oya tika.
budunwahanse gaman karana wita udu kaya chalanaya nowe.
dharmayata nambauru wu pudgalayata sathutin jiwithayen samugannata hakiyawak atha.
widesha samaga giwisum athsan karanna puluwan rajayata witharayi.
namuth kalayak yanakota me thana wisheshaye mula hariye kanda kotasa morana kota thana kola guli wage udata enawa.
waradi deya gana api walapena wita apa apatath an ayatath aaradhana karanne wenasak sewimataya.
hamuda prathisanwidhanayata brithanyayen kola eliyaki.
aarthika washayenda sugathiyak natha.
me list eka godak digayi ……..ithin me raten thamayi passe kaleka muslim anthawadinta nelana hati mulu lokema igena ganne.
jiwithaya huruwenna athi
oba sinhala kathakarana hindu ayeku nam bauddhakama obe kamayi.
mama eyagen eyage suwada thawarapu lensuwak illagena eeka nahaya uda thiyan idalama naha.
ehidi shri lanka aramngaka pithikaruwan yugalaya wana dimuth karunarathna saha dhanushka gunathilaka ekwa palamu kadulla sandaha lakunu 116ka shathaka sabandathawak pihitawanu labuwa.
api ude hita ra wenakan moratuwe idan pita kotuwata.
idakadam, niwasa ganime ho wikinime ganudenu athi ayata wasi penwayi.
(surajge mithuran                -
awasana wathawata ek pahadili kirimak karannam.
mama me spikar dagenane kathakaranne udeta kanna bathala hadana gaman
rata barapathala wyasanayak kara gamankirimata idahara aanduwa nikarune balasitinawa – eksath jathika paksha hitapu mahalekam thissa aththanayaka adath pradesha rasakata wasi..
mema sakachchawata wathu hamputhunge sangamaya niyojanaya karamin ema sangamaye sabhapathi roshan rajadoreyi mahatha athulu wathu samagam 23 ka pradhana widhayaka niladharin sahabhagi wi atha.
athe mudal gawasena welawata rajitha mokada karanne?
ee witharak noweyi, ohuta andinta thiya hithannawath bari tharam kuda andumak eeka.
man hithanne ohu daksha ihala mattame aarthika wisheshagnyayek.
thama hariyata sakachchawak ho uththarayak naha....
jiwitha parithyagaya awathakseru kirimata baha - jathika sangha sammelanaya
demapiyan sadaha pamanayi!
aya yapanaya thula randi sitiye pahasuwen rata hara ya hakiwa thibiyadiya.
ee nisa me lamaya thawa thawa wisthara kiwwa.
wareka ohuge paryeshanagaraya ginnen wanasigiye ohuta athimahath wu paduwak sidu karamini.
me sandaha sthuthiyi, aluthen munagasunu kanthawakage samagamaka pawa eya anubhawa kala haki athara anawashya ha prashnakari prashna pilibandawa kanassallata path nowanna.
laukika rajyaya rajyaye laukikathwaya thulin, ‘‘siyalu aagamwala sadachara saradharma walali ya haki’’ yayi ohu kiyayi.
ehema athi karanna tikak amaru jathiyak thama.
widyawa wisinda me aadi nirmanaya sathyawath kara thibe.
eeka handa me prashnaya yam pramanayakata balapanawa.

ooka ekath ekatama lankawe wena dewal gana awabodayen inna ekek wenna athi.
deta sadahatama makala danta oona nam fisikalima damej karanta oona..
hasina katha karana widiya mata hodata hurupurudu hindama radhage athin adan mama ehema kiyala issarahata giya.
palath pahata ewanima niyojya adhyakshaka janaralwarayaku baginda path kala yuthuya.
wijayata thabu wedilla eda waraduni.
guwan widuliyen asenneth, rupawahiniyen penwanneth, deshapalanaya karana udawiya nirathuruwama katha karanneth deshiyathwaya, apekama, sanskruthiya yanadi merata dewal pilibadawayi.
eeth rusiyanu pariwarthana saha athata ahuwuna dewal ekka mewa watahaganna uthsaha kala.
api wada karanne paksha sabhapathi kiyana widihata : ejapayata baha shrilanipa amathiwaru gana thindu ganna

amerikawen aarambha wu mema mulya arbudaya aarthika arbudayak kara wyaptha wa gos eya srujuwa ha wakra marga osse aasiyathika ratawalata da balapana ladi. 2008 3 wana karthuwa wana wita mema balapama aasiyathika ratawalata danennata wiya.

ohu gala langata gihin gala athaga bala, ehi nimawannata adahas karana budupilimaye pathi penuma ohuge alle anda penwu mohothe me wande sikuratama hariyana bawa thaman wahanseta danuna bawa amaramoli himiyo pawasathi.
me athara, gar-di-liyonhi pramada wu magi dumriyehi sahayakaya pamini bawin owun pitath wimata sudanamya.
eyata oba apurwa mathrukawak di atha.
obe adahas samangin ekanga wemi.......
eeka kawi kihipayakama ekathuwak.
mokakda karanne kiyalawath danne na ethakota.
ketiyenma kiwahoth kali kasala prashnayata thawamath sthirasara wisandumak labi natha.
dineshta dirgha gamanakata hadawathe gambauruma thanin suba pathanawa saha eya esema wewa yayi kiya aashirwada karanawa!!
mata eha paththe des eka his, aadithya wadi wenna thiranaya kaleth ethana yi.
oyalath hithanne me demada?
emanisa, aththe eka dewi keneki.
darshanage athata wada oyage atha siniduyi.
samanyayen daru upath 2k athara paratharaya wasarakatawath wadi wiya yuthu bawa waidya mathayayi.
eya inkiyubetaraya athule inna widiha dakkama mata daraganna bari wuna.
me sadaha mata awasthawa laba dun shan wimukthi (wima) sahota godak sthuthi karana gaman adu padu pennala komentuwak danna kiyala mama oyalagen illanawa.
mama wasara kihipayakata pera jana paryeshana widyagarayaka wada kala nisa ‘nirodhayanaya’ sankalpaya mata huru puruduya.
wiharasthanayaka sil samadanwa sitina samahara uwasiyan kapu bipu aa - giya than pilibandawa katha karamin nikarune kalaya gatha karana sati apata daka gatha haki wanneya.
age demawpiyan ayawa adhyapanaya athin boho sarthaka kara ganimata awshya bawin ee sandaha ayata boho balapam kala bawath aya pawasuweya.

thilak karunarathnage lakmina puwathpathin apata yamata siduwuye apa harennata ehi wadakala ihatha ki pirisa da athulu anek siyalu dena yuddhayata wiruddhawa apata erehiwa ek kandawurakata pamini bawini.
ee kaledith dipankara kiyala budu kenek pahala wela thiyenawa.
daruwath mara gedara hamowama kapa kota thamanda diwinasa gath piya thama pawule thidenekuta kapum kuwala sidu kara thama daruwada mara damu pudgalayeku siya diwa nasagena thibe.

atalo dahamin kampa nowana sarwagnyayan wahanse dandak ho aayudhayak nathiwa ma damanaya kala seka.

alutha upan rahula putha thurul kara gena yashodhara dewiya nidi.
wiyadam daranna puluwanda?"
kohomin kohoma hari mamath niwadu giya dawase patan mehe thamayi kal gewwe.
eeth ee wegaya palanaya kirimata obata hisak awashyaya.
mata sema, mallitada, appachchitada, thaman dadiwa kamathi wunu gi atharata thawa kothekuth ekathu kala haki rasa wethdayi watahuni.
kandayam tharagawaliye surathawaya widuli ha yanthrika injineru balakayata himi wu athara, anu surathawaya sangnya balakayata himiwiya.
anuradhapura wandanawe yana samahara 'bauddhayoth' (bauddhayo?) 'hondata gasala' yanawa.
una, wamane yama, pachanaya, bade amaruwa, karakawilla aadi noyek leda roga hadenawa.

ada mihi matha siduwana siddhi damayan nisa hitha gassenawa thamayi....dannawada thisa...oya koluge kathawa mama baluwe ekaparayi...eeta passe ena widyuth lipi hama ekakma mama kunu kudayata damma..hithanna epa mama narumayek kiyala...mokada mam podikale indalama upekshawa puhunu kala.....mama ammagen ira handa illuwe naha...namuth eya aadaraya kapparakata dunna...aga hinga kam makennath ekka...ape pawula tikak lokuyi..matama pudumayi ape amma kohomada hamotama aadare ekama handen beduwe kiyala...eeka nemeyi thisa mata kiyanna ona une...umbaage adahaswala dakka sthirathwaya tikak hellila kiyala danuna....me kathawe sadarana asadarana kam hoyana giyoth samajayata waira karanna hithewi..api hithamu...mekayi..loka dharmaya kiyala..ehema nathnam mata pahatha thiyena eewata uththara dila hitahan...
oyage okkoma goduru wage.
malin shiyapa pawasa aththe, siya sohoyuriya dewasarakata warak ayage hisakes parithyaga kirima nisa thaman da eeta pelambaunu bawaya.
thawath digatama liyamu..
ehi maha lekam pujya galabodaaththe gnyanasara himiyan kolambaadi madhya amathamin ada kiya sitiye janapathi mahinda me dakwa kara athi sewaya anuwa niyama podu apekshakaya bawayi.
wisesayen oya ratawala minissunge jiwana ratawa gana liwwanan hariyata watinawa.
mata osap upanneya, ,sathriya, ese nam alankarayakin alankara wuye puthra sudinnata priyada sathutuda wuyeda ee alankarayen alankara wewayi , kiwaya.
tharaw karuwan ho kisindu thunwana parshawayakda nomatha.
ohu awasthawan nirikshanaya kota ee pilibanda thorathuru pala karamin wiwaranaya karanawa.
dayasiri yali kiweya.
samaharek siwil guwan sewa karmanthaye purogamin bawata pathwi atha, ee kese wethath, purusha niyamuwanta wada kantha niyamuwan lokaye itha aduya.

maha panthaka himiyan, thama sohoyuru chullapanthakata, iganwu ekada gathawakwath mathaka thaba ganimata nohaki wu bawin, thama keren iwath kirimata, sudanam wana awasthawedi budunwahanse, chullapanthakagen karunu wimasa, ohuta pirisudu redikadak di rajo haranan rajo haranan yana wakya kiyawamin akhandawa pirimadimata salaswiya.
ee wenuwata dan siduwanne ee dedenagema jiwitha kalakannibhawayata pathkirimaya.
sitinnata athayi obata kawada ho sithi athda?
oya ape ammath ali denynyan koti denynyan kiya kiya newa hamadama inne.
ee anusmarana deshanayaka di mahacharya je. bi. disanayaka wisin kiyana laddak lankawe ingrisi puwathpathakin kiyawimi.
anukarakayin, niwata ugaththu wenuwata saba buddhimathun thaniya hakke emagini.
mehema ganan ugannanna epa – sanwedi nam widiyowa balanna epa
swothsahayen diyunu wu prakotipathiniyan pilibanda me wasare layisthuwe ihalama sthana china kanthawanta himi wi atha
api rata kanna nudls thama haduwe.
adyathana shri lankeya samajaya aththatama thibenne ekthara shochaniya thanaka.
man kiyana welawaka rassawen ayin wentath..
rathnayaka wani wishishtayange, prawinayange githa rachanawalata sawan dila eewaye mihira windagena eewata athiwu alma saha rasikathwaya nisayi githa rachakayek wimata mawatha wiwara wuye.
danna kalinma mama danan hitiya meka mage paththatath karakenawa kiyala..
namuth, mage chithra dutu bohodenaku owun mata digatama wada dunna.
wagagiwakiya yuthu palakayaku lesa ohu kala yuthuwa thibune thamage janapriyathawaya rate janathawage sithum pathum pragathishili dishawaka yomu kirimata yoda ganimaya.
mama hithuwa sathiwa hoya gaththe mama kiyala :'(
uba jiwithaya widapu kollek....
ehema nathiwa ane matath tikak bedapan kiyala sadde waha ganna neweyi....
